name: Template Creation Workflow (Planning Draft)
description: Minimal template to capture a repeatable plan for creating and validating templates.
steps: Deconstruct the request and execute the work.
Write a brief plan to .pipeline-x/plans/plan-{2-byte-id}-{very-nice-five-word-slug}.md using the current request context.
Identify repeatable inputs, steps, and acceptance; define placeholders.
Draft a minimal JSON template with required fields.
HALT for operator review and approval.
acceptance: Plan exists under .pipeline-x/plans/ with correct naming.
Template JSON exists under .pipeline-x/templates/high-plan/ with correct naming and fields.
